Text: OK you say it has both english and Italian. How do I change it from Italian to English>>
Thanks for the info, not  ----- WANKER

If you play this and want to listen in English try playing it using VLC.  
When you right click the video you will see a drop down menu.  under Audio select track 2
to turn off subtitles, right click again and under video turn off the subtitles.
